errorMessage.maxValueMustBeGreater: The maximum value must be greater than the minimum

placeholderListRandom: Add one participant in each row...

description.header: Free to choose the winner from the list, Excel, CSV database.
description.body:
Choose a winner from a list, CSV database for free.
 For all organizers of sweepstakes and contests, Gift Random has created the best free online randomizer for choosing a winner from a list, Excel, CSV database, which guarantees honesty, openness and ease of determining winners.

descriptionNumberRandom.header: In order to ensure the fairness of contests and prize draws, Gift Random has developed its own as honest and free online randomizer (random number generator) as possible to determine the winner.
descriptionNumberRandom.body: The main criteria for creating a number generator were honesty, openness and convenience. Everyone can use the Gift Random randomizer to quickly and easily generate a random number within the given limits and thereby determine the winner of the contest, or get the result for various purposes.
